    • Uses of Scratch in com.defano.jmonet.tools.base

      Methods in com.defano.jmonet.tools.base that return Scratch 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Scratch Tool.getScratch()
      Gets the scratch buffer of the canvas that this tool is presently activated on, applying this tool's anti- aliasing mode to the scratch buffer's graphics context.
      Scratch BasicTool.getScratch()
      Gets the scratch buffer of the canvas that this tool is presently activated on, applying this tool's anti- aliasing mode to the scratch buffer's graphics context.
